about_the_game:
Dive into the eerie world of ParaSonar, where an unknown threat looms over humanity. Paranormal electromagnetic waves and storms have begun leaking obscure creatures into our dimension, bringing chaos and death. ParaSonar Co. has developed powerful tools to combat the unknown, and brave volunteers like you are key in the fight against this horror. So, what are you waiting for? Join ParaSonar Co. in the battle against the paranormal and help restore order. Good luck!

The gameplay

As a volunteer cryptid hunter, you're equipped with ParaSonar's advanced operating system and powerful image analysis tools to investigate paranormal events. You'll monitor, scan, and analyze files of victims provided by the ParaSonar Investigation Team. But be cautious, as your investigation will draw cryptids toward you. By feeding visual, audio, and spectral data into your Defuser Machine, your last line of defense, you'll generate a spectral shockwave strong enough to neutralize these creatures. Stay sharp and stay safe!

  • Master the image analysis tools and examine the investigation files.

  • Choose your OS Helper, your reliable sidekick for investigations, each offering unique advantages.

  • Ensure your system is stable and functioning properly.

  • Keep an eye on your Proximeter, which tracks unusual signals in your surroundings. If it's active, you're being hunted.

  • Locate the file containing the most data and feed it into the Defuser.

  • And above all, stay alive.

                                                We'll see you on the other side!!!

short_description: Dive into the eerie world of ParaSonar, where an unknown threat looms over humanity. Paranormal electromagnetic waves and storms leak obscure creatures into our dimension. Equipped with advanced tools from ParaSonar Co., brave volunteers like you combat these unknown threats.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Armenian
*languages with full audio support
